title: Hacker Alert
body: My account got hack what. how do I recover it :( I hope I hear from you guys :(

replies.body: No worries, we have resources available to help regain access to your account.  As Rineyy provided, our[ account recovery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account)guide will have a series of steps you can take to take back control including reaching out to us.  If you are still having trouble, we'd be happy to help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and our account team and look into this.  You'll be in good hands!

Communicate with Riot’s[ Account Recovery Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)


The primary category is already selected. Fill in the rest of information (as much as possible).

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/riotkayle_banner.jpg?itok=ikhDcpBV
I only know my username and it is kimoy1610, and I forgot what I use as a email address for it. :( how do I do it.

Try to remember it, Account Recovery Support is going to need as much information as possible to verify you were the account holder. 

Also take a look at [Porocles' post.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/s2Ob3kal-hacker-alert?comment=0001)
